properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating flight of the first space shuttle on April 12, 1981, at Cape Canaveral, Florida, U.S.A., by John Young and Robert Crippen with space shuttle “Columbia”; cancellation stamp dated April 12, 1984 in Cape Canaveral; includes information on reverse.
